# preferredBehavioralStyle

**Instance Property**

The preferred behavioral style of the navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var preferredBehavioralStyle: UIBehavioralStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify the behavioral style for the navigation bar. If the value of the property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBehavioralStyle/automatic], use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/behavioralStyle] property to determine the actual style.

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBehavioralStyle/automatic]. To learn more about behavioral styles, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBehavioralStyle].

## Building with Mac Catalyst

- **behavioralStyle**: The behavioral style of the navigation bar.
- **currentNSToolbarSection**: The toolbar section that the navigation bar is currently using.
- **UINavigationBar.NSToolbarSection**: Constants that determine how the system hosts the navigation bar in an AppKit toolbar.
